resources.string: Welcome! This app lets you consult bus and train timetables, city parking slots availability, plan journeys, and even inform the community of train or bus delays.
Set up your usual routes to be notified about possible delays!
Keep track of your usual travel routes here.
Notify users about train or city bus delays.
Check the local bus or train schedule or find available parking in the city.
Read notifications about the journeys you saved!
Check the schedule of Trento buses and of the cable car to Sardagna. You can also check if there are delays reported by other users.
Check the schedule of Rovereto buses. You can also check if there are delays reported by other users.
Check the schedule of extraurban buses.
Check the schedule of railway lines across Trentino. You can also check for any delays reported by the service provider or by other users.
Check the real time availability of parkings in Trento. If the real time data is not available then the parking capacity is shown.
Check the real time availability of parkings in Rovereto. If the real time data is not available then the parking capacity is shown.
Stay up to date on the orders issued by the Municipality of Rovereto in terms of mobility (stop, speed, transit).
